description: [``botocore``] AWS Backup - Features: Add VaultType to the output of DescribeRecoveryPoint, ListRecoveryPointByBackupVault API and add ResourceType to the input of ListRestoreJobs API
[``botocore``] Documentation updates for Trust and Safety features.
[``botocore``] Releasing Tagging Support for Instance Management APIS
